description: Section 303 (d) of the Medicare Modernization Act (see Downloads section below) requires the implementation of a competitive acquisition program (CAP) for Medicare Part B drugs and biologicals not paid on a cost or prospective payment system basis. The CAP is an alternative to the ASP (buy and bill) methodology for acquiring certain Part B drugs which are administered incident to a physicians services.
title: Competitive Acquisition for Part B Drugs and Biologicals
